sentences.sentence: Miniature Yorkshire puddings with a morsel of beef and horseradish make a great canapé.
sentences.translation: 迷你的约克郡布丁配上一小块牛肉和辣根，做成了一个小饼干。

sentences.sentence: Wasabe (hot, green Japanese horseradish) can be added to make it spicier.
sentences.translation: 山葵(一种绿色的日本辣芥末)可以使寿司的味道更辛辣。
